django.templatetags.static.get_static_prefix(parser, token)[source]

Populate a template variable with the static prefix, settings.STATIC_URL.

Usage:

{% get_static_prefix [as varname] %}

Examples:

{% get_static_prefix %}
{% get_static_prefix as static_prefix %}
django.templatetags.static.get_media_prefix(parser, token)[source]

Populate a template variable with the media prefix, settings.MEDIA_URL.

Usage:

{% get_media_prefix [as varname] %}

Examples:

{% get_media_prefix %}
{% get_media_prefix as media_prefix %}

django.templatetags.static.do_static(parser, token)[source]

Join the given path with the STATIC_URL setting.

Usage:

{% static path [as varname] %}

Examples:

{% static "myapp/css/base.css" %}
{% static variable_with_path %}
{% static "myapp/css/base.css" as admin_base_css %}
{% static variable_with_path as varname %}
django.templatetags.static.static(path)[source]

Given a relative path to a static asset, return the absolute path to the asset.
